initial_story:
The Eurovision Song Contest is just around the corner and this year, it's taking place in Malmo, Sweden.

You can find out all about the event right here.

The UK's entry for 2024 is Olly Alexander who'll be performing his song, Dizzy.

But how's he feeling ahead of the big night, where he'll perform in front of 200 million people!

De-Graft sat down with him to find out all about his preparation for the competition.

The Eurovision Song contest Grand Final will be shown on BBC One and iPlayer on Saturday 11 May.
stories:
The Golden Guitar Awards are just around the bend and this year, they're strumming their way to Nashville, Tennessee.

Get the lowdown on the event right here.

The USA's pick for 2024 is country sensation, Jessie James, who'll be belting out her tune, "Whiskey and Worn-Out Dreams."

But how's she handling the pressure ahead of the big night, where she'll take the stage in front of a packed Ryman Auditorium!

Ryder caught up with her to get the scoop on her prep for the competition.

The Golden Guitar Awards will be broadcast live on CMT and streaming on Paramount+ on Friday, June 16.

The Starlight Serenade Festival is just a heartbeat away and this year, it's harmonizing its way to Austin, Texas.

Get the inside scoop on the festival right here.

The UK's choice for 2023 is indie darling, Luna Night, who'll be mesmerizing the crowd with her haunting melody, "Moonlit Skies and Forgotten Lies."

But how's she coping with the spotlight ahead of the big night, where she'll perform in front of a sold-out Zilker Park crowd!

Maverick sat down with her to uncover her secrets for staying focused under pressure.

The Starlight Serenade Festival will be broadcast live on BBC Radio 1 and streaming on Spotify Live on Saturday, August 12.

The Sunset Sessions Music Summit is just around the corner and this year, it's making its debut in Miami, Florida.

Get the exclusive lowdown on the summit right here.

The US's hottest new act, electro-pop sensation, Ruby Wild, will be electrifying the crowd with her infectious beats and sultry vocals on her chart-topping single, "Lost in the Haze."

But what's her strategy for dealing with the intense media scrutiny leading up to the big night, where she'll take the stage at the iconic South Beach Amphitheater in front of a packed house!

Vogue caught up with her to reveal her tips for staying calm and confident under the microscope.

The Sunset Sessions Music Summit will be streamed live on YouTube Premium and broadcast on SiriusXM on Friday, September 15.

But what's his secret to navigating the pressures of fame leading up to the main event, where he'll headline the legendary Ryman Auditorium in front of a sold-out crowd?

Rolling Stone sat down with him to uncover his techniques for staying grounded and focused under the spotlight.

But how does she balance the subtleties of her artistic expression with the pressures of working alongside renowned conductors at the prestigious Accademia Musicale?

Vogue went behind the mask to uncover her secrets for maintaining her creative integrity amidst the grandeur of masquerade balls and sold-out opera houses.

The Moonlit Sonata Masquerade will be broadcast live on Rai 1 and streamed on Spotify on Friday, October 13.
